text: "Amame" () is a song by American singer Selena. "Amame" became the fourth and last single from Entre A Mi Mundo (1992). "Amame" peaked at number 27 on the Hot Latin Tracks and number 21 on the Regional Mexican Airplay chart. "Amame" was remixed for Anthology (1998). It included a ballad version of the song. == Charts == Chart (1993) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Latin TracksSelena - Music Sales Information.
